name: VZVirtualMachineDelegate
desc: The methods you use to respond to changes in the state of the VM.

items.name: func guestDidStop(VZVirtualMachine)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the guest operating system stopped the VM.

items.name: func virtualMachine(VZVirtualMachine, didStopWithError: Error)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the VM stopped because of an error.

items.name: func virtualMachine(VZVirtualMachine, networkDevice: VZNetworkDevice, attachmentWasDisconnectedWithError: Error)
items.desc: The method the framework calls when an error causes a VMâ€™s network attachment to disconnect.
